tournament.name: Destination Qualifier - Modern Monsters Geddon Edition - Dungeon Street

decks.notes: This deck focuses on using Eldrazi creatures and ramp spells to quickly put powerful threats onto the battlefield while controlling the opponent's board with removal spells and disruption. By utilizing cards like Emrakul, the Promised End and Sowing Mycospawn, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large creatures and shut down their strategies with counters and removal. The deck also includes mana ramp cards like Utopia Sprawl and Talisman of Creativity to accelerate into its big threats ahead of schedule. Ultimately, the deck seeks to dominate the game through its powerful creatures and disruptive elements.

This deck aims to efficiently ramp up mana and cheat out powerful threats early on, utilizing Amulet of Vigor and bounce lands to generate extra mana and take extra turns with Primeval Titan to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and bonuses from lands like Urza's Saga and Lotus Field. The deck uses a combination of land tutors, combo pieces like Malevolent Rumble and Scapeshift, and utility lands to create a flexible and powerful engine that can quickly assemble a winning board state.

The main concept of this Aggro - Hollow One deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with cards such as Blazing Rootwalla, Detective's Phoenix, and Vengevine, in order to bring out powerful creatures like Hollow One and Ox of Agonas for cheap or free. The deck utilizes cards like Burning Inquiry, Faithless Looting, and Goblin Lore to cycle through the deck and enable explosive turns. By maintaining pressure on the opponent with early threats and a steady stream of creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on aggressively controlling the game using cards like Thoughtseize and Counterspell to disrupt the opponent's strategy while utilizing Death's Shadow and Murktide Regent as powerful threats. By combining efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Dismember with strong card advantage engines such as Expressive Iteration and Psychic Frog, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. The inclusion of cards like Force of Negation and Spell Snare helps protect its key threats and maintain tempo advantage, making it a formidable aggro-control deck in Modern.

The focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and hand disruption, while also utilizing card advantage and powerful threats to secure victory. By denying the opponent resources and countering key spells, the deck aims to outvalue and out-tempo the opponent. The inclusion of powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares ensures that the deck can close out the game quickly once it gains control. The deck also includes a mix of efficient removal spells and card selection tools to maintain its control over the game.

This deck is focused on quickly overwhelming opponents with a swarm of aggressive Merfolk creatures. Using Lords to boost each other and disrupting opponents with bounce and counter spells, the deck aims to control the pace of the game while steadily building up a board presence. Aether Vial provides additional mana efficiency and allows for instant-speed creature deployment. With a mix of disruptive spells and powerful creature abilities, this Merfolk aggro deck aims to quickly close out games before opponents have a chance to stabilize.
